body:
The package creation documentation for `CMakePackage`-s incorrectly shows `configure_args()`, when it should use `cmake_args()`.

The relevant code block appears in this section:
https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/packaging_guide.html#cmakepackage

This leads to `spack install` silently discarding all build options.
title: Packaging Guide incorrectly shows CMakePackage using configure_args.
